comment: Rudest teacher I've EVER had at KSU. She seriously told us the first day of class that she hopes we remember high school math and how to use our calculators because she has no clue. She didn't even teach with her own material, she just used a different professors. She is so rude and talks down to you if you ask questions in class. Awful person.

I don't know why everyone is saying she is nice. She's a mean old lady that needs to retire. She doesn't ever own up to any mistakes. She threatened our class saying that she has never lost when students have gone to the dean, which shows her character. It's not about her winning its about dealing wthe students and solving the issue. Avoid her.

4 tests total. Grade on the final replaced your lowest test grade. TEXTBOOK homework never collected; more like "extra practice". WebAssign (online) homework weighted heavily (3 attempts WITH online tutor). Overall, I would take again, she is fair and actually cares for the students' grades. Yet, class material (slideshows) did NOT match test!

She means well, but awful teacher. Literally doesn't know how to use the calculator, and I'm pretty sure all of the materials she uses came from another professor. The practice tests help, but I still failed the tests because she makes the problems way more difficult. I really struggle with math and should not have taken her class at all.

She is super mean. She does not take the time to explain anything at all and she grades really harshly, especially on the group project. Don't bother asking for help on a test because the one time I did she told me I was doing everything right and when I got the test back I got a 60, and when I confronted her all she did was deny she said it. Awful

Shes a very sweet woman, study guides do help so much on the test.. that is if you paid careful attention and are a great self-learner. I made a group of friends in the class and we taught ourselves the material before tests. Very smart when it comes to math but doesnt know how to explain it AT ALL. Very frustrating.
She is one of the sweetest women you will ever met. She gives studyguides that match up with the tests pretty well. One group assignment that is alright. Not hard

Please don't take her, i scrounged to get a b. She went so slow she decided to no test over the last 2 units, she doesnt put grades online and keeps your tests, she picks favorites that talk to her, mostly adults, she never checks her email, she cannot teach what she knows, she made an easy class so hard and im good at math. shes just really mean.

Not willing to help. Don't ask questions she hates that. Slow grader. Uses other teachers material so if you ask how to do something she says I don't know this isn't mine. AVOID AVOID students teach the class. Just a horrible person/ teacher
She is a very sweet and helpful lady, who loves her job. The web assigns arent easy or fun, but she will work with you on anything. As long as you show up to class and pay attention you'll be fine!
Dr. Baldree is a great professor. She is very friendly and outgoing and never hesitates to answer questions. The course work is VERY easy. I definitely recommend the course.
Do not take this class!!!! Not good at all :(

Horrible teacher. She is not good at answering questions. She just repeats what she just said and tells you to read the book. She seems to be annoyed that she has not retired yet. Take Joe Bible if he is available.
worst teacher ever useless person to me. doesnt help u out at all. dont take her

Dr. Baldree takes attendance every class. Be sure to go to all classes and do the homework and webassigns. The end of the semester was very rushed and the last test was awful. I went to the math lab for extra help/better explanations of concepts. Do the practice tests and all other assignments and you will do fine.

She teaches like its something everyone should know.  Also if you're not right out of highschool then I dont recommend her.  She's always referring back to what you learned in high school, and as for me high school was 7 years ago, so that doesn't help.

It's my opinion that Mrs. Baldree is a very good teacher.  She's very knowledgeable and passionate about math and if you pay attention in her class, you shouldn't have much problem.  I'm terrible at math, but she's very helpful and her study guides get you prepared for the tests.  If you take the time to ask questions, she'll help you.

Super easy class if you took basic classes in high school! She will help anyone if they ever have questions. I never bought a book and didn't have a problem. You do have to buy webassign online- it is like $30, but its an easy way to only do homework right before a test. She is always willing to help! Definitely take her!
She's know her stuff, but CAN NOT explain it. She seems as if she's mad that she has to work!
UNLESS YOU ARE ALREADY A MATH PRO DON'T TAKE HER!!!!She is not for the hands on leaner.  Math couldn't be this difficult to explain.
She is one of those professors who know the material, but cannot teach it to others. You practically have to teach yourself in her class.
She is unwilling to help and acts like everyone should understand things without further explanation.

NEVER TAKE HER!!!!!! She makes you do hours of work for a major grade online 'webassign', which you can only answer the problems a couple of times and if you were wrong they are set in stone! You will not no how that adds up until your final grade is a letter or more lower than you expected from your test grade totals.

She likes to teach with powerpoint. Her powerpoints are elaborate BUT devoid of any REAL information, she never shows you how to work a problem she just CLICKS and gives you the answer. She relies HEAVILY on the book. Homework is through webassign and is VERY hard. She can't help you with it either because she can't view the homework until it's due

DO NOT TAKE THIS TEACHER (if you can even call her a teacher). She read word for word from the book and made things WAY more confusing than they were. Does not explain well or give good examples. Tests were pretty difficult and nitpicky. Worst math teacher I've ever had!

Worst teacher ever!!!! she cant teach to save her life!! she reads straight from the book and her tests are really hard! dont take any class from her b/c i everyone i know who has taken her class has fail.

LOVE LOVE HER! she is so adorable with her little outfits and her stilletos. she is like your little grandma and she doesnt know too much math... but she is an easy teacher. dont be intimidated by her and talk to her if you have problems. do the homework and go to class at least once a week... take her easy easy

I didn't like her at all she reads from the book and uses the examples from the book. everything is from the book... she is not helpful if you dont understand the problems and often gets frusterated. I love math and usually get good grades but i had no clue what she was trying to teach
I didn't like her at all she reads from the book and uses the examples from the book. everything is from the book... she is not helpful if you dont understand the problems and often gets frusterated.
